dict.acceptation: 部门，部；系，学部；知识范围；车间；

sent.orig: The company consists of Department, home decoration department department, department, Department, Department Department of after-sales service.
sent.trans: 公司下设工程部、家装部、设计部、采购部、市场部、财务部、售后服务部。

sent.orig: The company has five independent departments: Department, Accounting Department, Technology Department, Department, Foreign Department.
sent.trans: 公司设有生产部、核算部、技术开发部、销售部、对外贸易部五个独立的部门。

sent.orig: The company is compost of HR and Department Department, Quality Control Department, Administration Department, Department, etc.
sent.trans: 公司机构设有：人力资源培训部、保洁技术部、质量检查部、行政事务部、财务部等。

sent.orig: HB Swan sets up:International Department,Inland Department,Tour Department for conference.Reception Department,and Tickets Center.
sent.trans: 公司下设：国际部，国内部，会奖旅游部，接待部和票务中心。

sent.orig: Association secretariat consists of: integrated Department, Information Department, Member Department, Training Department.
sent.trans: 协会秘书处下设：综合部、息部、员部、训部。
